issue.title: [C++] Deduplicate schema equivalence checks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7946](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7946). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are several locations where a group of schemas is checked for equivalence including
`UnionDataset::Make`, `Table::FromRecordBatches`, `ConcatenateTables`, and `WriteRecordBatchStream`. These should be extracted to a helper function
